statements: SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics;
SELECT id, timestamp, product_id, revenue, units_sold FROM SalesMetrics;
SELECT product_id, timestamp, units_sold FROM SalesMetrics WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT timestamp, product_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM SalesMetrics GROUP BY timestamp, product_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(revenue) as total_revenue FROM SalesMetrics GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(units_sold) > 100;
SELECT product_id, timestamp, units_sold FROM SalesMetrics WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, revenue FROM SalesMetrics WHERE units_sold > 50 ORDER BY revenue DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, product_id, timestamp, revenue, units_sold FROM SalesMetrics WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(unit_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT region, SUM(total_sales) AS total_region_sales FROM sales_performance GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_region_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE region = 'North America' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00 ORDER BY product_id, quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales, SUM(total_profit) AS total_profit FROM sales_performance GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT region, AVG(total_sales) AS avg_sales, AVG(total_profit) AS avg_profit FROM sales_performance GROUP BY region ORDER BY avg_profit DESC, avg_sales ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, revenue, quantity_sold FROM SalesMetrics;
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT rep_name, territory FROM SalesRepresentatives WHERE territory = 'East';
SELECT * FROM SalesTargets WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT target_amount, achieved FROM SalesTargets WHERE target_amount >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM SalesMetrics WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT rep_name, territory FROM SalesRepresentatives WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY territory DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity FROM SalesMetrics GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM SalesTargets WHERE year = 2022 AND target_amount >= 5000 AND achieved = False;
SELECT rep_name, territory, hire_date FROM SalesRepresentatives ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT rep_name, rep_email FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY rep_name DESC;
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount < 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT sp.sales_id, sr.rep_name, sp.sales_amount FROM sales_performance sp INNER JOIN sales_representatives sr ON sp.rep_id = sr.rep_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;

SELECT sales_representatives.rep_name, sales_performance.sales_amount FROM sales_representatives JOIN sales_performance ON sales_representatives.rep_id = sales_performance.rep_id WHERE sales_performance.sales_amount > 5000;
SELECT sales_data.sales_date, sales_performance.rep_id FROM sales_data LEFT JOIN sales_performance ON sales_data.sales_id = sales_performance.sales_id WHERE sales_performance.rep_id IS NULL;

SELECT products.product_name, sales_data.sales_amount AS total_sales FROM products JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_metrics;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM sales_team ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM sales_performance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM sales_metrics ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_metrics WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM sales_team ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, sales_amount, performance_score FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount > 5000 AND performance_score >= 80 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
